section.title: New and Noteworthy in KIE Workbench 6.3.0 Beta 1
Real Time Validation and Verification for the Decision Tables

section.title: Improved DRL Editor
section.para: The DRL Editor has undergone a face lift; moving from a plain TextArea to using ACE Editor and a custom DRL syntax highlighter.
